description: If you just wash dandruff flakes away they will always come back. Because clear understands male scalp needs are different, clear men scalp and hair is specially designed to control dandruff symptoms at the source and lock in hydration from the first wash. Clinically proven to hydrate the scalp. Helps restore the natural moisture balance of the scalp. With citrus peel.

title: Clear Scalp and Hair Intense Hydration Nourishing Shampoo, 12.9 Ounce
description: Resilient, beautiful hair starts with the right foundation. Clear scalp and hair has a dual-action formulation: a white stripe of deep hydrating treatment, and an aqua stripe infused with cactus extract. It deeply hydrates the scalp and leaves hair resilient and beautiful.

title: CLEAR Men Scalp and Hair 2 in 1 Shampoo and Conditioner, Ocean Mineral Hydration, 12.9 Ounce
description: If you just wash dandruff flakes away they will always come back. Because clear understands male scalp needs are different, clear men scalp and hair is specially designed to control dandruff symptoms at the source and lock in hydration from the first wash. Clinically proven to hydrate the scalp. Helps restore the natural moisture balance of the scalp. With hydra blend, a mix of water mint, spirulina and other extracts.

title: Conair Fast Cut Pro 20-Piece Professional Haircutting Kit
description: Conair’s most powerful clipper the HC1000 Fast Cut Pro comes with everything you need to do professional haircuts and trims right at home. The Fast Cut Pro features the most advanced blade technology ever produced by Conair. Professional high carbon steel blades are driven by the state of the art powerful DC motor providing more torque and giving it a competitive edge. When compared to other brands the Fast Cut Pro cuts 2x the hair in a single pass. Taper control makes it easier to achieve expert quality cuts, trims, and detailing. Kit inludes barber scissors, comb and cape, deluxe storage case, cleaning brush and oil, 2 styling clips and blade cover.
